l2hostility.configuration.title: 莱特兰·恶意 - 配置
l2hostility.configuration.section.l2configs.l2hostility.client.tom: 莱特兰·恶意 - 客户端配置
莱特兰·恶意 - 客户端配置
l2hostility.configuration.section.l2configs.l2hostility.server.tom: 莱特兰·恶意 - 服务端配置
莱特兰·恶意 - 服务端配置
l2hostility.configuration.abrahadabraExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Abrahadabra
l2hostility.configuration.adaptFactor: Damage factor for Adaptive. Higher means less reduction
l2hostility.configuration.allowBypassMinimum: Allow difficulty clearing bypass mob minimum level
l2hostility.configuration.allowNoAI: Allow mobs without AI to have levels
l2hostility.configuration.allowPlayerAllies: Allow mobs allied to player to have levels
l2hostility.configuration.allowSectionDifficulty: Allow chunk section to accumulate difficulty
l2hostility.configuration.allowTraitOnOwnable: Keep traits on mobs tamed by player
l2hostility.configuration.auraEffectApplicationInterval: Interval for aura effect traits to apply
l2hostility.configuration.banBottles: Ban drinking bottle of curse and sanity
l2hostility.configuration.bookOfReprintSpread: When using book of reprint to copy books, drop extra on player and does not allow overstacking
l2hostility.configuration.bottleOfCurseLevel: Number of level to add when using bottle of curse
l2hostility.configuration.corrosionDamage: Damage bonus when nothing to corrode
l2hostility.configuration.corrosionDurability: Fraction of remaining durability to corrode, per trait rank
l2hostility.configuration.counterStrikeDuration: Interval in ticks for Counter Strike
l2hostility.configuration.counterStrikeRange: Range in blocks for Counter Strike
l2hostility.configuration.deathDecayDimension: On player death, clear dimension penalty
l2hostility.configuration.deathDecayTraitCap: On player death, reduce max trait spawned by 1
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelBase: Default dimension base difficulty for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelScale: Default dimension difficulty scale for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelVar: Default dimension difficulty variation for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.disableHostilityLootCurioRequirement: Disable curio requirement for hostility loot
l2hostility.configuration.dispellTime: Duration in ticks for enchantments to be disabled per level for Dispell
l2hostility.configuration.distanceFactor: Difficulty bonus per block from origin
l2hostility.configuration.drainDamage: Damage bonus for each negative effects
l2hostility.configuration.drainDurationMax: Max duration boost for negative effects
l2hostility.configuration.dropRateFromSpawner: Drop rate of hostility loot from mobs from spawner
l2hostility.configuration.drownedTridentChancePerLevel: Chance per level for drowned to hold trident
l2hostility.configuration.enableCurioCheckFilter: Enable curios checks whitelist for items such as ring of ocean, on only selected mobs to reduce lag
l2hostility.configuration.enableEntitySpecificDatapack: Allow entity specific difficulty configs to load
l2hostility.configuration.enableHostilityOrbDrop: Give player hostility orbs when upleveling difficulty
l2hostility.configuration.enableStructureSpecificDatapack: Allow structure specific difficulty configs to load
l2hostility.configuration.envyDropRate: Trait item drop rate per rank when using Curse of Envy
l2hostility.configuration.envyExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Envy
l2hostility.configuration.equipmentDropRate: Drop rate of equipments spawned via hostility
l2hostility.configuration.erosionDamage: Damage bonus when nothing to erode
l2hostility.configuration.erosionDurability: Fraction of lost durability to erode, per trait rank
l2hostility.configuration.fieryTime: Duration in seconds to set target on fire by Fiery
l2hostility.configuration.flameThornTime: Time in ticks of Soul Flame to inflict
l2hostility.configuration.globalApplyChance: Chance for health/damage bonus and trait to apply
l2hostility.configuration.globalApplyChance.tooltip:
Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 1.0
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.globalTraitChance.tooltip:
Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 1.0
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.globalTraitSuppression: Chance to stop adding traits after adding a trait
l2hostility.configuration.globalTraitSuppression.tooltip:
Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 0.1
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.glowingRangeHidden: Detector Glasses glowing range for hidden mobs
l2hostility.configuration.glowingRangeNear: Detector Glasses glowing range for nearby mobs
l2hostility.configuration.gluttonyBottleDropRate: Bottle of Curse drop rate per level when using Curse of Gluttony
l2hostility.configuration.greedDropFactor: Hostility loot drop factor when using Curse of Greed
l2hostility.configuration.greedExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Greed
l2hostility.configuration.hostilitySpawnCount: Number of mobs to spawn in Hostility Spawner
l2hostility.configuration.hostilitySpawnLevelFactor: Level bonus factor for mobs to spawn in Hostility Spawner
l2hostility.configuration.initialTraitChanceSlope: Mobs at Lv.N will have N x k% chance to have trait
l2hostility.configuration.initialTraitChanceSlope.tooltip:
Default k% = 0.01, so Lv.N mobs with have N% chance to have trait
Mobs with entity config and trait chance of 1 will not be affected
 Default: 0.01
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.insulatorFactor: Insulator Enchantment factor for reducing pushing
l2hostility.configuration.keepInventoryRuleKeepDifficulty: Allow KeepInventory to keep difficulty as well
l2hostility.configuration.killsPerLevel: Difficulty increment takes this many kills of same level mob
l2hostility.configuration.lustExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Lust
l2hostility.configuration.maxTraitCount: Drop rate of equipments spawned via hostility
l2hostility.configuration.maxTraitCount.tooltip:
Max number of traits on mobs
 Default: 9
 Range: 1 ~ 100
l2hostility.configuration.newPlayerProtectRange: Mobs spawned within this range will use lowest player level in range instead of nearest player's level to determine mob level
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurCapAtItemMaxStack: Cap drop at item max stack size
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurDropFactor: All loot drop factor when using Greed of Nidhoggur
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Greed of Nidhoggur
l2hostility.configuration.orbRadius: Radius for Hostility Orb to take effect.
l2hostility.configuration.orbRadius.tooltip:
0 means 1x1x1 section, 1 means 3x3x3 sections, 2 means 5x5x5 sections
 Default: 2
 Range: 0 ~ 10
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadLevelColor: Overhead level color in decimal form, converted from hex form
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadLevelColorAbyss: Overhead level color for mobs affected by abyssal thorn
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadRenderFullBright: Overhead render text becomes full bright
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadRenderOffset: Name plate render offset in lines, upward is positive
l2hostility.configuration.playerDeathDecay: Decay in player difficulty on death
l2hostility.configuration.prideDamageBonus: Damage bonus per level when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.prideHealthBonus: Health boost per level in percentage when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.prideTraitFactor: Trait cost multiplier when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokSealBackpack: Allow Ragnarok to seal items with Backpack in its id
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokSealSlotAdder: Allow Ragnarok to seal curios items that adds curios slot
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokTime: Seal time per level for Ragnarok
l2hostility.configuration.reflectFactor: Reflect factor per level for Reflect. 0.5 means +50% extra damage
l2hostility.configuration.regen: Regen rate for Regeneration trait per second per level
l2hostility.configuration.removeTraitCheckInterval: Interval for which traits check if they are banned and to be removed
l2hostility.configuration.reprintBypass: Reprint will gain Void Touch 20 and Vanishing Curse when it hits a mob with max Enchantment level of X or higher
l2hostility.configuration.reprintDamage: Reprint damage factor per enchantment point
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfCorrosionFactor: Factor of maximum durability to cost for ring of corrosion
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfCorrosionPenalty: Penalty of maximum durability to cost for ring of corrosion
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfHealingRate: Percentage of health to heal every second
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfLifeMaxDamage: Max percentage of max health a damage can hurt wearer of Ring of Life
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfReflectionRadius: Radius in blocks for Ring of Reflection to work
l2hostility.configuration.selfEffectApplicationInterval: Interval for self effect traits to apply
l2hostility.configuration.showLevelOverHead: Render mob level in name plate form
l2hostility.configuration.showOnlyWhenHovered: Show nameplate style trait and name only when hovered
l2hostility.configuration.showTraitOverHead: Render Traits in name plate form
l2hostility.configuration.soulBurnerTime: Duration in ticks for Soul Burner
l2hostility.configuration.speedy: Speed bonus for Speedy trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.splitDropRateFactor: Slimes hostility loot drop rate decay per split
l2hostility.configuration.tankArmor: Armor bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.tankHealth: Health bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.tankTough: Toughness bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.witchChargeMinDuration: Minimum duration for witch charge to be effective, in ticks
l2hostility.configuration.witchWandFactor: Factor of effect duration for witch wand, to make up for splash decay
l2hostility.configuration.wrathDamageBonus: Damage bonus per level difference when using Curse of Wrath
l2hostility.configuration.wrathExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Wrath
